Content: The Director of the Pharmaceutical Supply Unit, Dr AT Sudarshana categorically rejects the allegations levelled by the GMOA of a drug shortage. However, GMOA representatives who addressed media conferences in several districts said that there is an acute drug shortage in their hospitals. Meanwhile, Director of the Pharmaceutical Supply Unit, Dr AT Sudarshana, in a communiqu√©, stated that there is no such drug shortage as alleged by the GMOA. It further said that the GMOA has been producing fake documents to prove their allegations.
